word_mean: 同音韵错语症：患者讲含相同辅音构成的词汇时发生的语言障碍

sentence.Network_en: We chose alliteration on the theory a little vulgarity enhances memory.
sentence.Network_cn: 在理论上我们选择有点儿粗俗的头韵来帮助记忆.

sentence.Network_en: It'seems to me that in prose alliteration should be used only for a special reason.
sentence.Network_cn: 依我看,在散文里,头韵只能在一定的场合使用.

sentence.Network_en: You have a true gift for inner rhyme and alliteration.
sentence.Network_cn: 你有高明的押内韵及头韵的本事.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 头韵（alliteration）(Alliteration)是英语语言学分支文体学的重要术语。头韵（alliteration）是英语语音修辞手段之一，它蕴含了语言的音乐美和整齐美，使得语言声 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin alliteratio (n-), from Latin ad- (expressing addition) + littera 'letter'

entry.def: Alliteration is the use in speech or writing of several words close together which all begin with the same letter or sound.

means.word_mean: 1. use of the same consonant at the beginning of each stressed syllable in a line of verse;

sentences.sentence: "around the rock the ragged rascal ran"
